Text:
Hello my friends

I have been searching for English subtitles for these episodes for such a long time. I have searched on here,isohunt, subscene, and all other sub sites, without success. If anyone knows where I can attain a copy of the subs please be kind and post the source or email me. 

Many thanks.

Lee

James_x121@yahoo.co.uk
Anyone got any english subs for episodes 1-16?
